posts.author: KailPendragon
posts.content:
NWN2 Spell Icons for NWN1

For those that like the NWN2 icons spell better. Beware that you might need some time adapting to them since they can be radically different from NWN1 ones.

posts.author: shia luck
posts.content:
Ooooooh! Pretty!

I had missed these and while I'll stick to the coloured versions from the transparent GUI package, these could be very useful for my attempts at writing custom spells.

thanks for the link Kail
